comment._content: For 1897, this is such a good pic...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] We had a bit of a discussion around the following photo on Mr Hall's equipment & skill. Whatever cameras WF & WJ Hall were using, at the time they were brilliant photographers. Can you image taking a photo of a moving object, from a moving object, with the old glass plate negative cameras? Mad skillz:
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
